DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA : able willing participate another drug study donate blood , take medication use contraception , comply protocol EXCLUSION CRITERIA : abnormal evaluation , base physical exam , medical history , blood test ( include serum chemistry , hematology , HIV , HCV , hormone level ) history current use alcohol , drug , steroid abuse , > 3 alcohol drinks/day history testicular disease , severe testicular trauma , major psychiatric disorder , bleed disorder , current use anticoagulant testosterone participation hormonal drug study within past month
